member.name: P:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.TotalPoints
member.summary: Holds the total match points for the search.

member.name: P:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.MatchType
member.summary: Specifies the type of search to use when matching.

member.name: P:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.MinimumSubstringLength
member.summary: Specifies the minimum substring length to use when matching. Larger numbers return lower scores. Must be greater than zero.

member.name: P:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.IgnoreCase
member.summary: Specifies if you want to ignore case when matching.

member.name: M:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.#ctor(Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.MatchTypes)
member.summary: Initializes this class. Defaults minimum substring length to 4. Defaults ignore case to true.
member.param: Specifies if you want fast or accurate matching.

member.name: M:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.GetMatch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a score based on how similar the words are. A score of 100 indicates the strings are identical.

member.name: M:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.GetMatch(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns True when match score is greater or equal to the minimum score specified.
member.param: The minimum score of the match in order to determine a successful match.

member.name: M:Bosch_DigiCard.CompareWords.FindCommon(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Recursively substrings the first word, and compares it to the second.
